content.detailedDescription: Saw a large array of lights twic heading home from my office and when i got home i took out binoculars and saw what looked like a large pulsating bright light in the shape of a fish net like the ones they use to cast over a large area to catch small fish. it kept changing shape and appeared to have large holes in it but they kept reconnecting and a large white light was circling around the outside and sometimes into the object itself. almost looked like a large parachute that was brilliantly lit up, but was not floating down at all. watched it for about an hour and it remained stationary in the sky, but apparently some planes from the nearby airbase were sent to look at it. heard them launch and the object remained where it was but started to blink more and change shape more rapidly. got cold outside, went in to see if there were any news reports and went back out but it's no longer there.
content.summary: Looked like a gigantic fish net pulsating, changing shape glowing and getting brighter and alternately less bright. planes from air base were definitely set out to look at it. saw them around it at a long distance. no news reports as of yet.

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting  in my backyard and heard a helicopter and looked up and saw a shiny ball that was moving
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: I was sitting  in my backyard and heard a helicopter and looked up and saw a shiny ball that was moving

content.detailedDescription: Actually i didn't see the ufo with my own eyes, i saw it in the picture when i downloaded my pictures to my computer that day at home. i took the picture of the guatemala flag (it's my habit to take pictures of the flags i visit). i was living in venezuela back in 2009 and i didn't notice the ufo until i showed the pitures to my wife back at home that day. i just heard about the mutual ufo network today, that's why it took me so long to report it. that's all. thanks.
content.summary: Actually i didn't see the ufo until i downloaded my pictures to my computer that day at home, sorry.

content.detailedDescription:
Today april 27 2015 i saw a red bright-opaque star like object moving slowly to medium speed and kind quietly across the sky. i was ufo searching on my backyard when i saw a bright-opaque star like object moving kinda slowly to medium across the sky in one straight direction. it started from south heading straight to north in the center of the sky were i was, at 7:54pm.

notes: 

- this time i had a camera and i zoomed it (the object) and what i saw at first was like kinda a diamond figure and when i zoomed it what i saw was in the center of the object it was white and all around it was red, like a normal light when you see the center that has white, but then it changed the form and i lost it from the zoom thingy, but i was so exciting that i forgot to press the record button :( (note: the sky was clear with no clouds all sides can be seen of the the sky) perfect for stargazing ;)

- it was red light, not flashing nor blinking, intense opaque-red. (at the time you can distinguish (define) whether it was an airplane or not)

- this happened at 7:54pm (eastern time) (night)

- the object wasn't that far from my house, but it had altitude. (it literally passed like across-center the sky of my backyard, were i was)

- it had a straight track starting from south heading in north direction when it disappear.

- i think the object duration was approximately 1 minute of duration moving on the sky.
content.summary: Moving red light on the sky (read complete information)

content.detailedDescription:
I am happy to say that last evening (4/28/15) at around 1130, i saw the most definitively beautiful and bizarre ufo of my life. after this experience i would say it is the only one i have ever scene. 

this thing went from my field of view (an eastern facing downtown denver patio with a view of the skyline), coming from the south (castle rock) all the way to beyond my view of the nw (lyons), all in about 40 seconds. 

it went directly over capital hill area when brightest, then took a nw route over the downtown area, on to the northwest over the mountains....

it was at the same elevation as helicopters, birds, etc. (pretty frequent helicopters and planes in the area). 100% silent. moving unlike anything else i've seen. seemed like it was flapping wings like a very large bird. (or without sounding like an idiot: pretty much exactly like the being at the end of the abyss)

it was slightly reflective and transparent. it had the rough shape of a "v" wing formation, or a spade/teardrop. there were ~20 soft auburn, red, orange lights, that were shifting hue among each other seamlessly. the largest and most prominent lights were at the tip of the thing, and the rest of the lights seemed smaller and more numerous on out to the edges.The lights seemed to move subtly in waves as if they were all connected to some piece of fabric.... literally the best description i can give is that a huge (~football field) sized sting ray with illuminated front edges flew over denver. 

in my best approximation this thing looked like: a flock of glow in the dark orange geese flying north, a giant sting ray with illuminated edges, or a flying jelly fish / abyss type thing. 

i am sorry i could not record this. i did not have my phone, and it happened too quickly to want to leave inside to grab one. 

i waited another hour or so and saw nothing else.

just called it into the faa incident reporting line... it'll be interesting to see if i get any calls back?

saw one other coloradan reporting orange lights last night at least. 

seems mind boggling that many more people would not have seen this, as it basically went right over downtown denver.
content.summary: Large bird, sting ray, v shaped - orange/red light craft seen moving over denver

content.detailedDescription: On april 27, 2015 around 12:00pm i was in the back of my office building taking a lunch break when i observed three light coming from the north. at first it looked like an airplane because the lights were all side by side coming straight at me at around 10,000 feet. the lights then banked to my left staying in formation flying in long circles a few times. then the lights seperated and started flying all around each other. the lights were getting closer while they were doing there ariel manuevers. when they were directly over my head i could see that they were fairly large 30-60 feet in width. the lights stayed above me doing these remarkable manuevers. all of a sudden two more lights flying above those light north to south were flying at a remarkable speed, atleast 1000mph or more. when that happen the two of the three lights i was observing got into a formation and continued south toward the other two lights at a moderate speed. now there is only one light left and it was continuing to do circles and ariel acabatics. then all of a sudden it took off after the other two lights and caught up and went into a formation. how did i feel about it? it was an amazing experiance. the way they were moving around and manuevering these craft was an amazing site to see. i was extemely impressed by them. was not affraid at all. i have witnessed alot of other objects in the sky before that i couldnt identify. but this was one of the most amazing experiances i have witnessed.
content.summary: I observed three lights flying around in circles above my head in a flight pattern and then two more came in view.

content.detailedDescription:
I haven't really told anyone this story but i feel like maybe someone here might be interested in the information... in 2007 when i was 17, i was driving from my sisters house in west cork to my friends about 8 miles outside of town in the countryside.. it was about 5am the sky was that early morning blue and there where no clouds in the sky.. as i reached the brow of a hill my lights moved across the sky as the car leveled out onto flat road, a white light turned on. it was as though my lights hit it and it turned on it was weird. i immediately stopped the car and just stared at it, it could have only been 20-30m in front of my car and 20-30m high off the ground. it glowed white and was solid.. after a second or two (this gets very very weird) a mans voice that felt like it was coming from my chest area said ''we are all light'' but the words where kind of different in meaning (which i understood) ''we'' didn't just mean those on board, it included myself and other people on earth aswell, and ''light'' meant love.. (i know it's very weird)..

then it moved in a straight line and stopped near/over my friends house, and turned itself off/vanished....Now i have to explain, i was on top of a hill where you could see for many miles across the countryside, so although the house was another 6 miles away i could still see the general area..(if it was daytime i could have seen her roof). also it moved that distance so fast, that i said to myself, if it had moved even a fraction faster my eyes wouldn't have kept up..Out of the whole experience, which only lasted 10-15 seconds, the speed that it traveled was what shocked me, it was so hard for me to accept that something could move that fast...I still cant, its been 8 years and now that i'm writing this my mind is blowing all over again as i'm picturing it move.

...A few months later, i had regular dreams where i was met by two 6.5-7ft tall blueish people(fairly stereotypical looking guys actually), their eyes where big ovals, except weren't black like tv says, they were just bigger versions of a humans eyes..White with big blue iris's, they where amazing to look at actually.. the first time this happened, they asked me where i was from and i said i don't know to which they both started laughing, a really gentle laugh. one said that they knew i was going to say that.. then i asked where they were from and they said two planets which i wont mention because i probably sound crazy enough already..They lead me somewhere and said i must remember what they where about to show me...It was a plaque on the wall with four 3d shapes sticking out of it, which i knew were letters, even though they where more like sentences(i never said this made sense)..I said ill just go get something to write them down with, and woke myself up trying to get a pen ....

i managed to write down two of them....Which i can explain, one was like two squares diagonally and the other was a weird ''a'' i spent a while trying to figure out what they meant and i managed to find one online...Its called lambda(lowercase)''λ'', its a greek letter... it has a few interesting meanings if you want to wikipedia it..

there have been more visits over the years but they stopped when i was about 22 but i can only remember them for a few minutes after they happen..
content.summary: White glowing, looked mechanical, looked solid but also had the effect that it wasn't solid...Hard to explain

content.detailedDescription: At 11:45 on 4/29/15 i was smoking a cigarette on my friends deck when i noticed a flash in the west.Then a white hash mark looking object just appeared in the north sky about a mile from my location.It moved slowly from west to east then moved quickly to the  northeast. it didnt fly out of sight it just disappeared from view in the northeast sky.The whole incindent lasted less then 2 minutes.
content.summary: Observed white shining hash  mark object moving west to east the move abruptly north

content.detailedDescription:
It was about 2pm on july 3rd 2002. there 6 of us, 2 kids (3y/o girl, my 7y/o son) & 4 adults (aged 22-29 at the time). we were on a farmsite, 1 mi e, and 1/2 mile n of currie, mn. it was a clear sunny 80 degree day, with very few clouds. we had just shot off some fireworks, but nothing aerial, just small group reporters (black cat firecrackers) and some colored smoke bombs. 

my friend 1st noticed the craft to the northeast, and asked what it was. when we first saw the metallic cigar shaped craft, it appeared to be about a mile away, moving toward us steadily and slowly. not knowing the object's size, i'm just guessing at these distances. it got to a distance that appeared to be about 400ft. it looked like it was rather large, like could have been the size of the goodyear blimp. the shape was not "blimp-shaped", more cigar & shiny, possibly surrounded by a haze, but it may have been sun glare of the craft's shiny exterior.  again i do not know how big it was, nor the exact distances.

as we pointed out the craft to the others they came over toward us. at this point the craft just stopped and hovered. there was no sound, no wind, just the shiny object floating. we all agreed that we had no idea what we were looking at. i asked my son to fetch the binoculars. as he ran back to the house the object stayed, when he started running back with the binoculars the craft flew away silently, steadily, and rapidly to the northeast until we could no longer see it.
content.distance: 101-500 Feet, 501 Feet - 1 Mile, Over 1 Mile, Unknown
content.summary: Metallic cigar shaped object over easter murray county 7/3/02

content.detailedDescription:
This is my 2nd ufo sighting. and also the 2nd one from the same location.

weather: very light density of clouds (2% to 5% density) all over the sky - the blue sky was easily visible.
sunset (delhi time): 18:38 (india time)

i was waiting in the park, facing south-west-by-south, and happened to look up (straight ahead) -- as usual :-) .. yes, it was a different bench this time. the entire sky had a cloud cover of 2% to 5% density and the blue sky was easily visible through it.

i saw a milky-white rectangular object - like a thin horizontal line - in the sky, slightly to my left. the color was similar to what the moon looks like when visible in a clear sky during the day time. it was quite far away and high up in the sky, at 50° to 55° elevation from my location. from the distance it looked like a 1 mm thick and about 1.2 cm horizontally long, milky-white, rectangular line/tube. so tiny - blink and you miss it. it moved from my left to right and the direction was approximately east-south-east to west-north-west.

it didn't have the distinctive features of an airplane flying far away in the sky. also, airplanes normally don't fly in this direction because if they did, they would have been flying almost perpendicular to the airport runway (approaching from the right side - at 90 degrees to the flight landing path).

i don't know if it was a drone/uav/ucav/rpa (e.G. predator drone). i am not aware of drones flying over delhi. if it was a drone/uav/ucav/rpa, i don't think it would be so easily visible from a great distance. if it was a drone/uav/ucav/rpa, and if was closer, i don't think it would be flying over the area of the president's estate / central delhi / parliament house. again, i don't think a drone/uav/ucav/rpa would fly directly towards the airport. of course, air force planes are also stationed near the civil airport, but i feel this would not have been the ideal approach.

moreover, since it was moving roughly in the direction of the setting sun from my point of observation (sunset was after 48 minutes), it neither glowed due to the sunlight nor it reflected any sunlight and maintained a uniform milky-white color.

i later learnt that such crafts are known as cigar shaped ufos. i have seen an exactly similar craft in the program "chasing ufos" on national geographic. this type of craft is shown in the beginning of this episode about animal mutations.
content.summary: Rectangular, also known as cigar shaped, milky white color

content.detailedDescription:
Unpacking the truck in my driveway, i stopped to watch a fast moving high altitude military jet heading south over the mexico border when i looked back at the contrail and spotted an unrelated black flying object. i ran in the garage to grab my binoculars for a clearer view, and i was shocked to see that it took on a shift shaping form. i then grabbed the video camera to try and get some footage of the thing. i had trouble finding it at first in the monitor. after 50 seconds in the video, it shows up in my camera display. it then headed south east, and maintained the same altitude of what looked to be at least 1 mile up in elevation. i could not really see much detail of the object at first because i was trying to just keep it in the display view as i recorded. after viewing the video, it was behaving in an organic manner. which is to say that it had legs that contracted and protracted. it had what appeared to be an oblong head, terminating into a type of tapered point at the top. it appeared to have a tail or vestigial tail that would show when the object would take a "standing" position. the object looked to be following over a nearby freeway (8 east), and in some screenshots, the object appears to be looking down on the ground as if observing. i have tried to rule out this sighting by trying to determine if it was possible a drone or even a balloon. i have not been able to come to a conclusion as to what it is. i continue to scan the sky since that day. ready to get more video if i see it again. 
[name removed/cms/tg]
content.summary: A black, non reflective organic looking object. it moved as if it had legs, torso, arms and head.

content.detailedDescription:
-we were off the coast of the eastern seaboard, not 100% sure but i think we were off the carolina's. the boat was doing work ups getting ready for deployment, we had a full deployment crew. 

-me and a couple of other et's heard some of the watch standers on the island talking about seeing something crazy, they said something about trying lock on to it with the nato sea sparrow director's onto the object. me and a handful of guys on the night shift ran up to the o-10 where the watch standers were watching it. they had the mounted binoculars trained on the object. i thought they were mistaking two stars one of which looked like a pulsar (due to my pretty extensive knowledge of astronomy). the object then appeared between the two stars again, the other guys saw the object as well. we all thought we might be imagining it, asked each other a couple of times if they saw it too. we all agreed that it was there. 

-when i first noticed it, i thought i was imagining it. how could a star disappear then reappear right in front of me? i watched it through the mounted binoculars changing colors between blue, white, purple, and pink at high speed, it kept pulsing. 

-it seemed to stay motionless, the problem was that the altitude was just high for any of us to make out exactly what it looked like, from our vantage point we could see that it may have been hovering and possibly moving but just can't say for sure. after about 5 minutes of viewing the object as we were all trying to get a look at it, a bright flash filled the sky in the location of the object, it looked like it shot with an incredible speed and was gone. we were traveling north, the object was northeast of our northerly heading. our speed was approximately 15 to 20 knots. 

-the three watch standers at there post reported that two similar objects had come out of the main relatively stationary object and then rejoined the main object.

-during my time watching the object cic (combat information center) was trying to get a radar lock on the object with the nato sea sparrow missile directors. the directors (which are radar directors, fire control radar) kept trying to lock onto the object then it would drop back down to the horizon, the os's (operation specialists) trying to drive the director back there again. every time they would drive to get a lock the lock would fail and the director would be driven back down again. it seemed to me that the object was overriding the directors drive control or that the radar receiver was being over powered and being forced by internal programming to protect its receiver, (to get away from the source of the electromagnetic radiation) it could have been over-driven by the object being to close but more than likely the object was jamming the radar. i can't say weather it was jamming the object passively or actively, just that the radar was being jammed.

-after the sighting i checked the spn-43 and sps-49 radar in catcc neither of them had a radar return, although at that altitude the chances of a radar return are very slim. 

-i tried to report it to my chain of command, they laughed at me and said that we didn't see anything. we probably just excited, i didn't expect that reaction especially when cic reacted the way they did.
content.summary: Tried to track with radar on board uss theodore roosevelt

content.detailedDescription:
On a warm breezy saturday night about 6:30/7:00pm as i was locking the front door to my mothers house.My brother,my brothers friend and i was leaving the house ready for the skating rank.As i proceeded down the walk way to the car wher everyone was waiting on me.My brothers friend was in the front seat,my friend was in the back seat and my brither was in between the door way of the car with his back to me.All of the sudden something in my mind told me "look up".As i looks over my right shoulderinto the corner of the sky,i saw about 7-8 lights that were a redish/burgundyish that was shaped like small diamonds.They popped into the atmosphere one following the other,then they went around into a circle,then they lined up horizonally.Thats when i tried to get my brothers attention.It was to late i wathed them take off one by one and disappear into the dark dusk night.
            first sighting.My first sighting was sumitted already.
content.summary: I witnessed seven-eight diamond shaped  bright lights following one another in our atmosphere

content.detailedDescription: My husband, toddler grandson, and i went outside to see some new blooms on our flowers.  i always watch the sky and happened to spot a cylindrical, wingless object coming from the southwest.  i pointed the object out to my husband (a skeptic), and he asked, "what is that!"  i told him that it was the same type of ufo that i had seen a few years ago.  the object appeared to be a silver-white color, emitted no sound or trail, and had a dark spot in the middle which could have been a bay of windows.  the object seemed to be traveling too high to be a blimp.  it then turned eastward toward lunken airport.  i really would like to know if there was a blimp in the sky today, and did lunken see anything on its radar.  i have only a feeling of self-satisfaction for being given the opportunity to view a possible ufo.  also, i am happy that my husband also witnessed this sighting.  we lost sight of the object as it continued toward the east.
content.summary: Cylindrical ufo over kentucky

content.detailedDescription:
I had just left cvs about 2 minutes prior where i had also taken pictures in that direction with no sign of the objects. i was laughing cause cvs still had a sign up wishing people happy holidays in april.

i had just gotten out of my car at home when i noticed what looked like a bunch of plane contrails heading in the same direction. it was about 7:45.

there were 5 of them heading in from varying directions and i was thinking omg they are gonna crash. then they made almost a diamond shape and from there made a straight line heading down to the ground then vanished.
content.summary: 5-6 objects in sky

content.detailedDescription: I was walking towards wilcox road in sheffield, uk when this object caught my eye. luminescent lime green egg shaped, very fast and quiet. appeared high in sky but lower than a passenger jet and much quicker. made no sound. saw the same thing again next day travelling in the same direction so could have been something on an orbit. not saying it was alien but this sighting has played on my mind for years.
content.summary: Appeared coming towards me but very high in sky, passing rapidly overhead.

content.altitude: Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover), Over 500 Feet (no cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: We were moving an aircraft to the west hard stand. i observed the object while guiding the person driving the airstair up to the aircraft making a v form movement. after that i proceeded to stumble my cell phone cam from my pocket to record the event. it would seem to hover then move then hover than move. we are professionals at what we do in our occupation and we can tell an airplane from a halo to a weather balloon. this is not an incident of hysteria or randomization.
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Irratic course no beacons breakneck direction change speeds hover and breakneck acceleration

content.detailedDescription: My buddy saw something in sky at night, said look, i turned around and saw a grey illuminated rectangle, with round large lights on the sides flying above the tree tops pretty silently except for a low hum. watched it rotate, change direction by a few degrees, and go till we couldn't see it anymore as it was flying low over the forest/swamp.
content.summary: Saw the ufo while on break with my friend large craft and low.

content.detailedDescription:
Seen an object appear while watching a plane in the sky in omaha/bellevue  nebraska around 6 pm.
noticed the object during processing of photo.
looks like a ufo
it was flying in front of an airplane and never changed course.
content.summary: Seen an object  appear while watching a plane in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I gazed into the sky at the right moment to see what i initially identified as a long white kite the shape of a boomerang/kite/wide chevron with a tight interior triangular edge and a wider/longer looser exterior edge gliding through the sky, then upon closer look i realized what i was seeing was a cloud or vapor or steam, like when hot meets cold and it was rolling from the sharpest point of the boomerang outward into wispy edges that dissipated as they rolled out. i stared hard trying to see an actual object but saw only stars and clouds behind the leading vapor creating the visual anomaly that had drawn my attention. i watched expecting it to be a weather phenomenon - expecting to see it dissipate entirely but to my surprise it shifted it's course, instead of being in a seemingly straight line as it had been since i first saw it, it gently tilted as if changing trajectory slightly more north away from west which it was heading. i took my eyes off it twice to convince someone nearby who was not able to locate it but i was able to locate it two more times after taking my eyes away from it and the sky. it was heading northwest then slightly corrected to north just over about 5 miles west of the strip and had a steady continuous pace at no point did it stop or hover, it was more of a steady slow gliding very steady not erratic like a bird. i don't know depth/height so well enough to describe its height but the motion of movement being so steady was almost reminiscent of a blimp and the best analogy i could give for the height at which i saw it as well. it appeared to me as if something transparent was disturbing or creating cloud/steam/vapor that rolled off the point of an invisible object, the vapor it was either creating from heat/cold mixing or disturbing in the sky was the only thing i actually witnessed. i heard no sound that i perceived to be coming from it and saw no lights
content.summary: Large invisible triangular object created vapor mist in shape of a long boomerang in night sky

content.detailedDescription: On my way home from work i noticed a very bright and low to the horizon orange light. when i arrived home i told my husband and we went outside to observe the light, we watched about 25 minutes while it hovered and did some aerial moves. it would get brighter then dim out. go higher then lower,side to side. while i was on this site checking the map for ufo activity, it faded out or flew away, either way it was gone. super awesome while it lasted though
content.summary: Craziest coolest thing i've ever seen!! outside smoking find a bright ass orangey light hovering and doing some crazy aerial movements then it just for away!

content.detailedDescription: While at home i observed a star that seemed to be flickering in the southwest night sky, about 9:30 pm. the object was showing what looked like aircraft marker lights(red/green)but randomly. i assumed at first it was an aircraft. the object did not move but gradually descended below the southern horizon-in about an hour. it appeared to be in orbit. i called several people, my brother being one. he was in the high desert at acton ca. and could see it. a co-worker at chino airport in san bernardino county could also see it. i did report it to the altadena sheriff's station. i also filmed it, both still and video. i am guessing the space station. but i do not know.
content.summary: A blinking star red, blue and white. motionless but descended below horizon

content.detailedDescription: I noticed it in the sky called my husband to look at it also with the binoculars he said it was a star i looked at other stars they werent flashing red & green.I noticed 2 other ones right below the 1 st one and the other off to the left of the other two.They werent moving so my 1 st thoght its a sattelight but you never know i ve seen this before so every once and awhile i look into the sky and i saw them tonight.And i ve checked sightings before but no unusual reports like these green & red lights.Family thinks i am crazy.( i am not)i dont feel scared just would like to know what they are & thouht you may have an answer for me thank you donna delaney
content.summary: Opened front and saw strange light in sky got binoculars out and saw like a red green lights flashing but it wasnt moving husband said its a star but i looked at other stars & they werent flashing red & green also there were 2 other ones in the sky also.

content.detailedDescription: A friend and i saw a white reflective ball/ orb that flew silently about 3 miles to our north. i took video of the event. i started the video late and missed most of the event with my phone.
content.summary: Friend and i saw awingless white ball about 3 miles to our north.

content.detailedDescription:
Was driving down nashville road with my mother, south toward springfield.  off to the left near a house we both saw three small orbs (about five feet across probably) in a line parallel to the road, about 75 feet off the ground.  they were mostly red, but flickered and almost appeared to be on fire.  like fire balloons you see launched at festivals, but there was no string and nobody around who might have launched them.  there was no noise that we could hear.  the orbs were perfectly stationary as we drove past, until the one on the right suddenly moved toward the one on the middle in a straight line.  i looked straight up at it and could see only more flickering, but the right one almost appeared to have an arrow underneath it pointing back toward town.  

since i wasn't driving i couldn't force the car to stop - i finally got the driver to turn around about a half mile down the road.  we turned around and drove back but the orbs were gone.

the temperature was about 60 degrees, no wind.  the night was perfectly clear.  it wasn't really a frightening experience at all, just more "what the heck was that."  it happened so quickly we didn't really realize what was happening until it was too late for photographs, unfortunately.
content.summary: Three flickering orbs, evenly spaced, about 20 feet apart.

content.detailedDescription: Was on porch with daughter when these 12-18 craft flew over us (silent) at 3000-5000 feet at around 100-120 mph in a v formation. got behind trees, we ran out to other side of trees to see them again. daughter noted another set of these crafts in a v formation also. they were around 2 miles out, when they came closer together. the first group we saw started flipping and flying very strangely, but staying in formation. then we noticed a black larger object flying very close to these objects in a different direction, out of there formation. i found the exact objects that we saw on you tube  (the best ufo sightings in the united states 2015)
content.summary: White surfaced crafts, darker tipped wings

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting in my hot tub on the deck overlooking lake michigan.  it was a very clear night with millions of stars showing.  i had spotted a saterlite crossing from south to ne about 1/2 hour earlier.  saterlite take about 30 seconds to cross from first siting in the south to when it disappears over my tall trees.

that night i saw an object tear shaped come out of the south at a high speed and way up there is in area of the stars. it was three times the size of a star and came over my house, did a left turn 90 degree and shot over my house and headed west in less then 5 seconds. i have no idea what the speed was but i know what i seen.  what ever the g-force was, it is something i don't think we human can achieve.

a friend of ours, living across town (25 miles away) was out smoking a cigeratte and saw the same thing i did.  (could not delete the gold copper button)

i thank you.

rhs
content.summary: Tear drop object at incredible speed

content.detailedDescription: Object was hovering and glowing white yellow.
content.summary: Glowing like a star. hovering

content.detailedDescription:
I was driving home from a friend's house early in the morning.  i took a shortcut through the local high school parking lot.  it was about 1:00 a.M.  as i was driving, i observed in the distance a green circle rapidly rise straight from the tree line and i to the sky.  it appeared to start from the ground.  i was astounded at how quickly the ring ascended.  as it did so, i saw the circle go from a larger size to a smaller size.  i thought for a second it must be a power line or an electrical tower giving off some electricity or something.  but, i grew up in the area and i am familiar with area where the circle ascended from.  at the time, there were only woods and single family homes.  i drove over to the location and drove around and around looking for something that would explain it.  i couldn't find a thing.  the closest thing in the area was a telephone pole but that could t account for the size, shape, speed, or the height that this circle achieved.  long, rambling paragraph.

i've never forgotten this.  i have thought about it often over the years, but i never really told anyone given that i am an attorney and former prosecutor.  i wanted to share this sighting.  i don't know what it was, but i do know it was highly unusual and strange.  i will always wonder.
content.summary: Saw a green sphere rocket up into the sky.

content.detailedDescription: The weather was getting bad and a storm was coming in. a bounch of gray and black clouds came in.   the airport on terminal c at dfw airport on gate c35  i just finished prepping a plane and it took off. when waiting for another plane to come in, i saw a sphere come out of the clouds change to a saucer then a cloud then back to a sphere. while the ufo was changing forms it looped and punched a hole in the clouds. then another sphere just appeared then changed to a cloud and went through the hole in the clouds .
content.summary: The ufo started as a shere then changed to a saucer then a cloud then back to a shere
